channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 21:03 Air alert in Kyiv region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 游댮 21:03 Air alert in Kyiv region. Follow further messages. #Kyiv_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
